titleInfo.title: Bobby Bowden and Don Fauls at the Miami Orange Bowl 1981, Florida State vs. Oklahoma

originInfo.publisher: Heritage Protocol, Florida State University, Tallahassee, Florida.

mods:mods.note: Personal photographs of Don Fauls, athletic trainer at Florida State University from 1954 to 1986. These photographs are part of the Don Fauls Collection (Accession No. HP-2009-044). The collection was donated to FSU by his children.
mods:mods.accessCondition: This image is the property of Florida State University. Its use is governed by U.S. and international copyright laws. To obtain a high-resolution copy of this image for a fee, please contact Florida State University Heritage Protocol.
This collection is open to all researchers.
